s.text: Sequel to this she has asked me to look for and recommend a reputable and reliable person/company who can conveniently and sincerely be in Partnership with her in the investment.

My name is Paul Daisie a lawyer and financial consultant, I have a client who is willing to invest in your company or country on a partnership basis.
Date: Mon, 15 Nov 2010 16:02:20 +0100 (CET) From: j_daisie@rediffmail.com To: j_daisie@rediffmail.com Subject: REPLY ASAP
